hero.title: Premium Hospitality Solutions
hero.description: Comprehensive B2B solutions for hotels, restaurants, and bars. From new construction to daily operations, we deliver quality products and exceptional service.

newConstruction.title: Hotels – New Construction
newConstruction.h1: Building Excellence from the Ground Up
newConstruction.description: We provide comprehensive solutions for new hotel construction projects, ensuring quality, efficiency, and attention to detail at every stage.
newConstruction.architecturalSuppliesDesc: Premium materials and fixtures designed specifically for hotel construction projects.
newConstruction.roomFurnishingsDesc: Complete bedroom solutions including luxury beds, linens, and room accessories.
newConstruction.LobbyCommonAreasDesc: Elegant furniture and décor for creating welcoming common spaces.
newConstruction.kitchenEquipmentDesc: Commercial-grade kitchen equipment for hotel restaurants and room service.
newConstruction.interiorDesignDesc: Curated design packages to create cohesive and appealing spaces.
newConstruction.customSolutionsDesc: Bespoke furnishings and fixtures tailored to your specific requirements.
newConstruction.completeProjectManagementDesc: From initial planning to final installation, our team of experts will guide you through every step of your hotel construction project, ensuring a seamless experience.

operating.title: Hotels – Operating
operating.description: We provide ongoing support and supplies for existing hotels, ensuring smooth operations and exceptional guest experiences.
operating.regularReplenishmentDesc: Scheduled delivery of essential supplies to keep your hotel running smoothly.
operating.qualityAssuranceDesc: Premium products that meet the highest standards of quality and durability.
operating.fastDeliveryDesc: Efficient logistics to ensure you receive your supplies when you need them.
operating.supportDesc: Round-the-clock assistance for urgent supply needs and inquiries.
operating.cleaningSuppliesDesc: Professional-grade cleaning products for maintaining pristine facilities.
operating.dedicatedAccountManagerDesc: Personalized service from a dedicated representative who understands your needs.
operating.streamlineYourHotelOperationsDesc: Our comprehensive supply management system helps you maintain inventory, reduce costs, and ensure you never run out of essential items.

restaurantsBars.title: Restaurants & Bars
restaurantsBars.description: From kitchen equipment to dining essentials, we provide everything needed for successful restaurants and bars.
restaurantsBars.underConstructionDesc: Building a new restaurant or bar? We provide comprehensive solutions for your construction project, from kitchen design to equipment installation.
restaurantsBars.kitchenDesignInstallationDesc: Professional kitchen layout design and equipment installation services.
restaurantsBars.commercialKitchenEquipmentDesc: High-quality cooking, refrigeration, and food preparation equipment.
restaurantsBars.barSetupEquipmentDesc: Complete bar solutions including equipment, glassware, and accessories.
restaurantsBars.operatingEstablishmentsDesc: Keep your restaurant or bar running smoothly with our ongoing supply services, maintenance support, and equipment upgrades.
restaurantsBars.chefSuppliesUtensilsDesc: Professional-grade tools and supplies for culinary excellence.
restaurantsBars.glasswareTablewareDesc: Elegant dining presentation with premium tableware collections.
restaurantsBars.beverageEquipmentDesc: Coffee machines, juicers, and specialized beverage equipment.
restaurantsBars.equipmentMaintenanceDesc: Regular maintenance services to keep your equipment running efficiently.
restaurantsBars.staffTrainingDesc: Training programs for your staff on equipment operation and maintenance.
restaurantsBars.emergencyRepairsDesc: Quick response for emergency repairs to minimize downtime.

services.title: Services
services.h1: Value-Added Services for the Hospitality Industry
services.description: Beyond products, we offer a range of services designed to help your business thrive and deliver exceptional guest experiences.
services.procurementConsultingDesc: Expert advice on selecting the right products and equipment for your specific needs.
services.installationSetupDesc: Professional installation and configuration of all equipment and systems.
services.staffTrainingDesc: Comprehensive training programs for your staff on equipment operation and maintenance.
services.inventoryManagementDesc: Systems and solutions to help you track and manage your inventory efficiently.
services.energyEfficiencyDesc: Recommendations for energy-efficient equipment and practices to reduce costs.
services.maintenanceRepairsDesc: Regular maintenance services and quick response for emergency repairs.
services.customizedServicePackagesDesc: We understand that every hospitality business is unique. That's why we offer customized service packages tailored to your specific needs and budget.
services.li2: Flexible service agreements to fit your schedule
services.li3: Scalable solutions that grow with your business
services.li4: Dedicated account manager for ongoing support

deliveryPayment.title: Delivery & Payment
deliveryPayment.description: We make it easy to receive your products and manage payments with efficient delivery systems and versatile payment options.
deliveryPayment.deliverySolutionsDesc: Our logistics network ensures timely delivery of your products, with options to suit your schedule and requirements.
deliveryPayment.nationwideDeliveryDesc: Fast and reliable delivery to any location across the country.
deliveryPayment.scheduledDeliveriesDesc: Regular delivery schedules tailored to your operational needs.
deliveryPayment.expressOptionsDesc: Expedited delivery for urgent requirements and time-sensitive projects.
deliveryPayment.deliveryTrackingDesc: Track your deliveries in real-time through our online portal or mobile app. Receive notifications at every stage of the delivery process.
deliveryPayment.paymentOptionsDesc: We offer a variety of payment methods and terms to accommodate your business needs and financial requirements.
deliveryPayment.flexiblePaymentOptionsDesc: Multiple payment methods including credit cards, bank transfers, and financing.
deliveryPayment.transparentPricingDesc: Clear pricing with no hidden fees or unexpected charges.
deliveryPayment.secureTransactionsDesc: Advanced security measures to protect your payment information.
deliveryPayment.businessFinancingDesc: For large projects, we offer flexible financing options with competitive rates and terms. Speak to our financial team to learn more.
deliveryPayment.orderConfirmationDesc: Your order is confirmed and processed by our team.
deliveryPayment.preparationDesc: Products are prepared and packaged for shipping.
deliveryPayment.shippingDesc: Items are shipped via our logistics network.
deliveryPayment.deliveryDesc: Products are delivered to your specified location.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have questions or ready to start a project? Contact our team for personalized assistance and expert advice.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project or inquiry...

footer.description: Premium B2B services and supplies for the hospitality industry. Quality products, exceptional service.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and industry insights.
